Text: Cc Attached is a copy of the proposal with my revisionsmy changes and deletions are shown in blue I had indicated in our telephone conference that I was expecting you to make the changes we discussed but that I was to furnish you language in a couple of instances Instead I made changes in all instances that we discussed In addition Marvin and Bob Priest asked me to make three changesthese include deleting the breakup fee of deleting the guaranteed availability and adding best efforts obligation language and adding language acknowledging that the monthly guaranteed fee would satisfy Enrons costs for software and hardware Please let me know if the changes are satisfactory I apologize for the delaybut I had to get my clients OK on these matters I also was talking to Wilson Montjoy on another matter and told him I did not consider it a conflict for him to represent Enron on this matter He is a good lawyer I hope your fathers surgery turns out wellI know how tense and edgy family members can be until they are told everything has gone OK David R Hunt This message from the law firm of Hunt Ross P A maycontain confidentialor privilegedinformation If you received this transmission in error please call us immediately at or contact us by Email at Disclosure or use of any part of this message by persons other than the intended recipient is prohibited DRH revised Enron Asset management proposal doc

Cc my completed version subject to a second review which Marvin reviewed as I was making the changes Marvin has not had a chance toprovide meall of R W Becks comments but I trust Marvin caught anything that Beck had cautioned against The awkward partisthe feewhich can be determined by a combination of the definition of Savings the section on Payment and Fees and the fee section of Exhibit A If I hadmore time perhaps I could have put it together better but rather than start over and write a new structure I tried to take the existing structure and language in the LOI and the proposed Asset Management Services Agreement My secretary and I had a very difficult time with the margin codes etc but I believe we have it straightat least in the point font of Times New Roman I will be out of the office Monday but I trust you folks can finish this off MDEA Interim Letter Agreement w Enrondoc

RE MDEA et al and Enron transactionwill be out of the office on Mondaybut am available the rest of the week for a conference call except from on Wednesday Original Message From mailto Sent Friday May PM To Subject MDEA et al and Enron transaction Gentlemen Could we schedule some time for a conference call next week I would appreciate the opportunity to work through some of the legal issues I have the lofty goal of not working Memorial Day weekend this year so Im trying to get as much done on this deal as soon as possible Thanks Kay PS Im open Tues am and most of Wednesday I can probably work my schedule so that Im available quite a bit of next week

RE Extension of ILA Cc is correct All are men Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday May AM To Cc Subject Extension of ILA Ive taken the liberty of drafting a form of extension letter to extend the ILA until June I suspect Reagan will be distributing to the commercial folks but I thought I would give you a heads up David Im at work on revising the longer term doc If you have your preamble stuff ready Im happy to put it in now Thanks Kay See attached file MDEA ILA extension May doc PS The salutation is to Gentlemen Are the members of the commission and MDEA all men I dont want to commit a blunder

RE Extension of ILA Cc I have OKed the extension letter and advised Marvin of my approval He will get it authorized by the Commission Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday May AM To Cc Subject Extension of ILA Ive taken the liberty of drafting a form of extension letter to extend the ILA until June I suspect Reagan will be distributing to the commercial folks but I thought I would give you a heads up David Im at work on revising the longer term doc If you have your preamble stuff ready Im happy to put it in now Thanks Kay See attached file MDEA ILA extension May doc PS The salutation is to Gentlemen Are the members of the commission and MDEA all men I dont want to commit a blunder
Attached is a redlined redraft of the preambles identifying the parties MDEA ESMA st page redraftdoc
REbelieve so I have it on my calendar at am Original Message From mailto Sent Friday June PM To Subject Re David Do you know if we are meeting on Monday I havent heard the final word Kay

RE MDEA power contractagency Cc is yes but there will need to be contracts between MDEA and each of the Cities Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday June PM To Cc Subject MDEA power contractagency David Is it possible for MDEA to purchase power from EPMI as an agent for the Cities This will obviate the need for any type of security Thanks Kay
